entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
